synopsis.text: Days of romance and sweet treats are in the air as Valentine's Day draws near at Sakakino High. In anticipation, a group of classmates, including Makoto, Sekai, and Kotonoha, take a relaxing trip to a hot springs hotel, where they share their plans for the upcoming holiday. On the day itself, the competition heats up as a bevy of girls vie for Makoto's attention, each eager to present him with their handmade chocolates. Meanwhile, Taisuke dreams of receiving his first Valentine's Day chocolate, adding to the mix of love, laughter, and confectionery chaos. Will Makoto be able to handle the flood of affection, and will Taisuke's dream come true? Only time will tell in this delightful tale of young love and sweet indulgence.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
